Name: Pilsvogel
Review Text: Was visiting the Albert C. market on a sunny day in august 24:th, 2019, when i suddenly feel the urge to get a nice cold beer and then "Pilsvogel" just appered in front of me. Name: Pilsvogel
Review Text: When we visited Amsterdam we went to Pilsvogel almost every night. We had delicious drinks and snacks, enjoyed meeting other people, and cozied up outside under the heat lamps with blankets to watch passersby. Everyone was very friendly and the bathroom sink is beautiful! Pop in for a treat!

Review Text: busy but nice bar

Name: Pilsvogel
Review Text: Great corner restaurant in a popular spot with the locals. English menu available when we asked, and delicious food. They serve both tapas and full meals at very reasonable prices. Name: Pilsvogel
